Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26937 affecting package screen for versions less than 4.9.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-26937 affecting package screen for versions less than 4.9.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package screen is earlier than 4.9.1-1, affected by CVE-2021-26937
